- [x] Project requirements clarified: Java Maven project
- [x] Scaffolded project structure: src/main/java, src/test/java, .github
- [ ] Customize the project (pending)
- [ ] Install required extensions (none needed)

## Execution Guidelines
- Use '.' as the working directory
- Avoid verbose explanations
- Only install extensions if specified
- Project is complete when it compiles and README.md exists
